text.content:
Level

Name

Description

Link

0

Assassin Spider

These thumbnail-sized black spiders are also called "One-step Spiders" because the potency of their venom only allows its prey to take a single step before they die.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.hk9qC2fd9g6iA924]{Link}

0

Goblin Gnawling

A ravening goblin toddler, all claws and teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.47i7qgasCjr0ceWQ]{Link}

1

Blood Vine

These dark red, blood-drinking vines grow prolifically in sunlight.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.huueSUBjfGzxUIBd]{Link}

1

Broodling

These tiny, hairless horrors resemble pale pink rat-men with needle-like teeth and huge, glassy black eyes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.LWpQAE6e3ewS3vRL]{Link}

1

Carnivorous Cave Moss

A glistening mossy patch of gray-green fungus.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.x3GV0x2ES7FLjEdm]{Link}

1

Carnivorous Frog

This hyper-aggressive, 3-foot-long frog has a mouth full of flesh-shredding teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.Gfrpf0whPaJoTAi0]{Link}

1

Dirt Wight

A shambling humanoid-shaped mass of earth and writhing roots containing a trapped soul.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.DRvl6lkgb3Wo4L2A]{Link}

1

Eye-fang

These leathery, green, 1-foot-diameter orb-like creatures have a single central eye, bat-like wings, and a mouth full of sharp teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.VqCLaL4wKPdSypbS]{Link}

1

Fenn√∫r

These gray, hairless, vaguely rat-like creatures have bat-like wings, long tails, and an obsessive hunger for humanoid teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.gPY39PrdJ0Mpmhcg]{Link}

1

Feral Foetus

A blood-drenched, undead humanoid fetus, with filthy nails and black needle-like teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.29eO88rekxYcpZgK]{Link}

1

Flumph

Wizened defenders of goodness and law, these creatures resemble floating jellyfish with large eye stalks and a mouth on its head.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.rwBROTLvMAs0HivQ]{Link}

1

Gaal, Man-bred

These goblin-bred humanoid soldiers are raised on underground farms, where humans are transformed into nearly mindless fodder troops.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.hiGleIhi61IEpkaj]{Link}

1

Giant Tick

These 5-foot-long blood-drinking arachnids are known to spread a virulent disease.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.O2W5j8DrmExXRA0B]{Link}

1

Goblin

A short, scarred humanoid with green skin, pointed ears, and a mouth with too many shark teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.CuWqGcePbUZnJgXk]{Link}

1

Goblin

A short, scarred humanoid with green skin, pointed ears, and a mouth with too many shark-like teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.DzX9OwE21qqVfzUC]{Link}

1

Pine Blight

Minions of the Pinestraw Man, these tiny constructs made of pine needles and twine are ever-hungry for the blood of sentient beings.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.dEn0n8o53SZhK318]{Link}

1

Piranha Bird

These tiny, bright green flightless birds hunt in packs, scouring the warm plains for fresh meat.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ynuVMRXGUX8Mr0YY]{Link}

1

Scarlet Death Adder

These 2-foot-long bright red snakes are among the most aggressive and venomous serpents in the world.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.C5AQpyO5dOD7GZCY]{Link}

1

Tommyknocker

These 2-foot-tall wiry humanoids have large heads, wrinkled faces, sunken eyes, and long white whiskers. They are xenophobic and unpredictable, but sometimes warn miners of impending cave collapses.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.lgh344MO765Kwbn3]{Link}

1

Tooth Fairy

A gaunt gray fairy with tattered wings, black eyes, and a huge mouth of mismatched teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.p1KchDMYk23UJ0Ri]{Link}

1

Vegepygmy

These diminutive humanoid plants are highly territorial and do not take kindly to trespassers.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.4MhnQrSnUJGRwoM4]{Link}

2

Biters

Ravenous and tenacious, these grotesque constructs resemble bloody skulls with small humanoid legs grafted to them.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.NLvR9hfs2U1ZSP11]{Link}

2

Carnivorous Tumor

This splotchy, hound-sized gray-black mass squelches forward with malicious intent.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.UQCyBIeaRUV13aEo]{Link}

2

Cat-sith

This large, faintly shimmering black cat sits preternaturally still, its hungry eyes staring right into your soul.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.nxoeLhKB68HfihOt]{Link}

2

Chaos Pudding

This bubbling pile of animal parts and flailing tendrils reaches forward hungrily.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.kguWFby09IYBeNnt]{Link}

2

Chon-chon

Certain dark gods call their disciples to serve them by animating the follower‚Äôs head after death, which sprouts bat-like wings and chews itself free from its body.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.AI5kYHezlpF6z94l]{Link}

2

Cooshee

These large, green-furred, elven-bred hounds are quick, lean, and stealthy.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.58msryY09hB9mnje]{Link}

2

Creeping Head

A rotting severed head propelled by ten spider-like legs.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.WtcYMwwBRc7RYQr5]{Link}

2

Eye-biter

This cat-sized hairy arachnid scuttles about on eight long segmented legs. Its underside is dominated by a dozen small toothy maws.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.kKUc1P3VKkthMM09]{Link}

2

Faun

This impulsive fey has the upper body and head of a man, goat-like legs, a bushy tail, and curling ram‚Äôs horns on his head.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.KP0lSRw2but84Vej]{Link}

2

Flygar

These 2-foot-tall cherubic, bat-winged homunculi have long prehensile tails.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ra6nAzslCb21qXzj]{Link}

2

Fungal Stalker

These small gray toadstools sprout into ravenous monsters, taking on the vague appearance of any sentient humanoid sleeping near them.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.8IxUJFgmk2emX08A]{Link}

2

Ghoul-men

The subterranean humanoid cannibals only vaguely resemble their cursed human ancestors.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.yNGf1RZmNxovs5U9]{Link}

2

Green Slime

This dripping, flesh-eating slime clings to dungeon walls and ceilings.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.QWSx8NMb9wj8ahbz]{Link}

2

Mireclaw

This dog-sized, slime-covered crab scuttles about on 10 segmented legs that each end in sharp claws.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.Ksco2yr4eGPssZAz]{Link}

2

Myling

Pale, dirty, and malnourished, the corpse of a young child slinks forward with red glowing eyes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.0xiJ5Mz8sQW4rPnG]{Link}

2

Piercer

Clinging to the ceilings of caverns, these creatures blend perfectly with natural rock, dropping in silence to impale unsuspecting prey.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.G7tXWjuc60tDFyPl]{Link}

2

Poltergeist

An invisible, incorporeal spirit driven to malevolent madness.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.oTph8mX1Oz4uthjP]{Link}

2

Root Thing

This 5-foot-tall, vaguely humanoid mass of twisted roots and soil lurches out of the ground brandishing wooden arms with cudgel-like fists.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.aJzzD1F9JRvGxwQN]{Link}

2

Sewer Conger

These 10-foot-long greenish-brown eels haunt the filthy sewers of most major cities.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.WZQvng2QM2MDp6Gh]{Link}

2

Shambleman

The expertly removed skin of a humanoid, filled with grave dirt and small stones, then animated to terrible un-life.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.WFqYMlQkGkCMjxY0]{Link}

2

Skull Creeper

This blood-covered skull has eight spider-like legs and glowing amber eyes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.hFpaMa8D9DjSRaLk]{Link}

2

Slimemoth

Dripping with sticky white ichor, these 3-foot-long gray slugs have large moth-like wings that sound like wet sheets flapping in the wind.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ZmRzJ3DtYls4PtqR]{Link}

2

Takwin

Made of mud, bones, and living tissue, the tiny humanoid constructs serve their masters with submissive devotion.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.sa8XGyBTsPc5QhDS]{Link}

2

Tongue-eater Host Body

Pale and reeking of rot, this dead-eyed man stumbles forward with his mouth agape and bloated tongue lolling.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.S7IwQEZlDytPYmfS]{Link}

2

Tsathoggan

These warty, vaguely toad-like humanoids are fanatically loyal to the vile elder being, Tsathoggua.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.pgImNmipkN0nhyjW]{Link}

2

Uddloran

Easily spooked, these 4-foot-diameter, sphere-shaped, white-furred omnivores roll across frozen landscapes at incredible speeds.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.1ozZ4wT8xrjMQTtx]{Link}

2

Vampire Bat

A man-sized undead bat, with glowing crimson eyes and a thirst for blood.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.vBc7OdKDLNPespC4]{Link}

2

Vampire Grass

These patches of voracious knee-high grass snare the unwary and drain them of their life‚Äôs blood.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.xUHxIxECTzmykQFo]{Link}

2

Wohlk

A burly, man-sized cyclops, wearing animal skins over chainmail with smooth pale gray skin and a mouth full of large square teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.OZzcgPCBQqt3lFB4]{Link}

2

Wolf-worm

A slimy, 7-foot-long white worm with a hairless canine head.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.wr8jNDy0RgYpVIJJ]{Link}

2

Zlann-yi

Once the sorcerous overlords of a world-spanning prehistoric empire, these decadent, demon-worshipping toad-men form subterranean kingdoms that constantly war with one another.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.e0NMmPfUxUF3MdLD]{Link}

3

Archer Bush

These man-sized carnivorous plants fire barrages of long, needle-like thorns to bring down prey.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.9uzkCb4GTtGz3BVe]{Link}

3

Asp-men

These scaly humanoids have a tangle of serpentine heads extending from their necks.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.rgUEoW1ONHuIPlkY]{Link}

3

Berbalang

A thin, bent humanoid, with leathery gray skin, bat-like wings, and glowing eyes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.Esb6X5U0qG2cXNPB]{Link}

3

Blood Orchid

The scent of this beautiful, man-sized pink and scarlet orchid induces extreme euphoria.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.eC1YjWiVd6S6HvOD]{Link}

3

Bloodbird

These 8-foot-tall, white-feathered, crane-like birds have long pink beaks capable of piercing plate armor.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.5chiJu1modB1CTWO]{Link}

3

Boarhound

These shaggy, green, goblin-bred beasts are a foul-tempered cross between a mastiff and a boar.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ADINkzDIorx4GzCO]{Link}

3

Bugbear

A 7-foot-tall hairy goblin with a powerful, hulking frame and sunken, over-sized eyes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.74fxHkFmgv1p4ZQI]{Link}

3

Candle Wight

This shriveled walking corpse has clawed hands and eye sockets holding a tiny burning flame.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.lTrhzaF5CpPSapTe]{Link}

3

Chupacabra

A blood-drinking, wolf-sized rat-thing with horns and razor-sharp teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.JbPKrVChRdtf8uq8]{Link}

3

Cragbeak

These 7-foot-tall, black-and-silver feathered flightless birds stalk remote mountainous regions for warm-blooded prey.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.rilIBp4O4ZbK1vEI]{Link}

3

Death Dog

Great black hounds with two heads and a virulent bite that causes flesh to rot and slough off the bone.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.EfoTwo7got44MCiO]{Link}

3

Death Shroud

Hovering in mid-air, this billowing white sheet surges forward hungrily, a vague dark stain resembling an enraged face imprinted upon it.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.cz6urMzoAk5E0Gz4]{Link}

3

Devil-swine

These half-demon, swine-headed humanoids gorge themselves on the flesh of sentient beings.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.n2qc2K8I0YlEl4wI]{Link}

3

Drowned Man

An animated, water-bloated corpse, its discolored, crab-eaten flesh speckled with barnacles and dripping with foul water.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.QLloIk3Hdih5o8xG]{Link}

3

Frost Spider

A pony-sized, frost-covered spider with a bulbous blue-white body, white eyes, and dripping icicles for fangs.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.dZQApOoZ0qcOqQR9]{Link}

3

Gauntlings

These 5-foot-tall, emaciated, hunchbacked humanoids have long willowy arms, squat legs, and drooping noseless faces featuring bulging eyes and a sucking mouth full of tiny, razor-sharp teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.pRYyxHDdycLZ7ueo]{Link}

3

Giant Earwig

This pony-sized insect has thin membranous wings and a wicked-looking set of pincers attached to the end of its abdomen.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.BsH5Wq8mG5Dv8hrH]{Link}

3

Pard

This supernaturally quick feline predator has long violet-and-green striped fur and lynx-like ears.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.Jq08mbP2OLvmGLYU]{Link}

3

Pseudodragon

This colorful, cat-sized dragon‚Äôs eyes are full of mischief and mirth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.4ty4a6NteypQwjn2]{Link}

3

Rat-thing

This small, rat-bodied creature has a sharp-toothed, bearded face and tiny human hands.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.iprIH8hmruZIxhgY]{Link}

3

Slime Lord

This shambling humanoid is covered head to foot with dripping green slime.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.uph64LXziOdyQ1q9]{Link}

3

Spirit Doll

Often taking the form of a doll, mannequin, or stuffed animal, these wicked constructs were granted unholy life by being infused with the soul of a murdered child.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.CWPqs20n2TFBt0Q5]{Link}

3

Stranglevine

Covered with beautiful multi-colored blooms, these predatory plants seek to capture and squeeze the life out of living prey.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.QQWd6IvaoV5e3iPG]{Link}

3

Stygian Lynx

This intelligent, six-limbed feline predator has oversized green eyes that contain captivating, endlessly spiraling patterns.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.zf90Yf4bOpYVcfw6]{Link}

3

Umber Jelly

A brown, clay-like mass of bubbling goo and reaching tendrils covered with tiny suckered maws.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.BZVF4o7ph1PUJEsX]{Link}

3

Werebat

A terrifying man-bat with great black wings and blood-red eyes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.En98Wj6cUubs8D3u]{Link}

4

Amm Bush

This predatory, man-sized plant creature has the ability to masquerade as common forms of plant life.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ft20i1IRyS2gAx3q]{Link}

4

Anaruk

These 9-foot-tall humanoids resemble albino baboons. Militant and savage, they war endlessly with other sentient races.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.H4nqY11Qzl5NIZVL]{Link}

4

Babbler

An 8-foot-tall carnivorous dinosaur with sharp teeth and claws, and a mottled gray and yellow hide smeared with muck. Its eyes betray a malicious cunning.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.gXI6F02seZ3PTqYy]{Link}

4

Bloodwing

This dark green, winged reptile has a 6-foot-long serpentine body and a mouth full of mismatched shark's teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.akAKpDGTjZcZFJQ2]{Link}

4

Boneguard

This armored humanoid skeleton moves with surprising speed and agility, its eyes blazing with violet flames.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.te0HGdwpEzd8AObO]{Link}

4

Bubble Slime

This 5-foot-diameter, translucent green sphere floats forward, dripping foul-smelling acidic droplets.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.qLwoog3qbhvxW7eU]{Link}

4

Byakhee

A gaunt, winged creature combining the worst features of a vulture, an insect, a bat, and a rotting humanoid corpse.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.nolGXheETwWid5tM]{Link}

4

Cadaver Slime

This pinkish ooze is typically found lurking inside the body cavity of corpses.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.yyAYbKYJQcshhEXR]{Link}

4

Chromatic Stalker

Hovering in mid-air, this vaguely humanoid-shaped creature is composed completely of color‚Äîan unearthly shade of ultraviolet you have never seen before.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.2jN6oc1RlLSMlKor]{Link}

4

Cinderbones

This charred humanoid skeleton is surrounded by an aura of burning ash and smoke.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ehuOzOJI0c7xozRC]{Link}

4

Curserot Shambler

These rotting, walking corpses seek to spread the necrotic curse that doomed them to eternal undeath.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.zz3ZVPHDeYRzmzOs]{Link}

4

Ebon Mist

A malevolent cloud of black mist that radiates an unearthly, numbing cold.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.teGyWB0YGVKhZiir]{Link}

4

Erlking

A tall, thin bearded humanoid, with gray-brown skin, red eyes, and long green-black hair. These malevolent fey haunt dismal woodlands and marshes.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.a9YU4CX945rjpXAM]{Link}

4

Ghost Eel Swarm

This tangled ball of squirming, vaguely translucent white eels swims through the air, teeth gnashing and eyes ablaze.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.pSre2P5ETH5nJMYf]{Link}

4

Ghost Spider

These hound-sized, ghostly-white spiders can turn temporarily incorporeal.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.ny80WOScOLWXf0Wv]{Link}

4

Ghoulspawn Hydra

This enormous beast has a shaggy, elephant-like body with a cluster of fanged, ghoulish humanoid heads writhing from long necks.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.RufYAMFEqw9Q8GZ8]{Link}

4

Giant Cockroach

These aggressive, horse-sized roaches have armored shells and flesh-shearing mandibles.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.PWhi1QNChe8IvUqp]{Link}

4

Glashtyn

A malevolent, man-eating water spirit that takes the shape of a horse with backward hooves.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.TrfrcNmCZEj2jBMM]{Link}

4

Goblin, Great

A man-sized goblin brute with corded muscles and a necklace of human ears.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.TqQvzmWd3mqZVNKw]{Link}

4

Hag Serpent

Bred by hags as minions and companions, these 15-foot-long humanoid-headed serpents are often mistaken for nagas, though their low intelligence quickly gives them away.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.BZNfqcDh5HylESSQ]{Link}

4

Hell Bird

A hound-sized raven with the head of a grinning, sharp-fanged human infant, always hungry for the flesh of sentient beings.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.71YDwj6WvflOsA45]{Link}

4

Hutakaan

These cultish, jackal-headed humanoids perform cannibalistic rites to placate their dreadful gods.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.KviG7Ryk26FuDBfx]{Link}

4

Jackalwere

A menacing, man-eating spirit with the body of a jackal.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.0msUDn4LIUmUxM4T]{Link}

4

Leucrotta

Intelligent and cruel, this horse-sized quadruped has the head of a badger, hooves of a stag, and a mouth with sharp bony ridges instead of teeth.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.bK4rW1go9oOOlWfD]{Link}

4

Marrow Ooze

An ambulant mass of clotted blood.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.KvvEgfyJIglBCvjN]{Link}

4

Meat Cube

Originally created as a food source, these 10-foot-square cubes of living meat have evolved into dangerous predators.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.6hK7023fIYTaID9l]{Link}

4

Niflundur

These pale, rime-covered humanoids resemble sharp-featured dwarves. Living alone or in small clans, they stalk the high glacial valleys and snowfields of the far north seeking sentient prey for their stew pots.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.n5Viq8qdHlpzvkuR]{Link}

4

N√∂ck

With dark blue-green bodies covered with lily pads and algae, these wicked fey lurk in ponds and lakes, hoping to snatch the unwary to a quick watery doom.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.uQWhK7k1sw6B7sVO]{Link}

4

Redcap

A murderous, sadistic fey that resembles an emaciated, sour-faced dwarf wearing iron boots and a blood-soaked cap.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.Z4ChYIcYqm73Ny5U]{Link}

4

Scorpion-man

These stealthy man-eaters have the head, torso, and arms of a man and the body of a large scorpion.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.AhfY3f7Z6pjYSDtw]{Link}

4

Snirik

These horse-sized armored arthropods lurk beneath desert sands, hoping to impale unsuspecting prey on one of the many barbed spines along its back.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.kl9c1FCwgofUQqzb]{Link}

4

Spellfire Ooze

A glowing glob of gelatinous slime, covered with a flickering aura of orange-red flames.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark-community-content.monsters.Actor.M03N85PbDfGMr3WF]{Link}

4

Spellgorger Ooze
